title: Cityviews of Amersfoort in 1928 in color

sources.title: Cityviews of Amersfoort in 1928 in color
sources.description: Interesting old film footage about the city of Amersfoort in the Netherlands, nearly a century ago. This film has been restored, enhanced and colorized by means of state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence software. Source B&W footage: Beeld en Geluid The music (titled "Like A Wind") is kindly provided by the Belgian pianist Franco Di Nitto.Â  Email: ricksfilmrestoration@gmail.com
